title: Towards New Heights….
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Eli-san…. You cannot do this. You mustn't….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I know that. Shizuku, please stay away from it. I’m…. already….gh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You can’t! There’s no way someone like you would be overcome by temptation, Eli-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’m…. not that strong of a person…. It’s fine, Shizuku, save yourself….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I won’t leave you behind, Eli-san! I’ll go with you!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Are you…. sure….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes. As long as we’re together, Eli-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Two cheese bubble milk tea with extra bubbles please<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hwaaaaaaah! How rich and mellow....! It’s like drinking a cheesecake!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>At last…. We have arrived at the peak of bubble drinks….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
